metadata.title: CVE-2015-3842 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in libeffects in the Audio PolicyService in mediaserver in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48I allow attackers toexecute arbitrary code via a crafted application, aka internal bug21953516.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
